titleStmt.title: A breefe description of the battailes, victories and triumphes, atchiued by the D. of Parma, and the Spanish armye. Sent by the king of Spayne, vnder his conduct to the succour of the rebellious leaguers of France. / Faithfully translated out of French by E.A. according to the French coppie, printed at Paris..
Discours sur la venue en France, progrès & retraite du duc de Parme
titleStmt.author: Farnese, Alexander, Duke of Parma, 1545-1592.
Aggas, Edward.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Edward White, and are to be solde at the little North doore of Saint Paules Church, at the Signe of the Gunne.,

notesStmt.note: Publication date suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Printers' device on t.p. (McK. 290); headpiece, initial.
Reproduction of original in: British Library.

place.placeName: the little North doore of Saint Paules Church, at the Signe of the Gunne.
